<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To avoid the BP value clobbered by a function call, we need to choose a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// callee saved register to save the value. RV32E only has X8 and X9 as callee</span></CodeLine>
